amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Resarcy and Devopment accounts and increase funds in the Spending Reduction Account by $1,543,929,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Resarcy and Devopment accounts and increase funds in the Spending Reduction Account by $1,543,929,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 300 (Roll no. 319).
